name: Chapel
text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

name: Moat
text: When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

name: Chancellor
text: You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

name: Workshop
text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Bureaucrat
text: Gain a Silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

name: Feast
text: Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Gardens
text: Worth 1VP for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Militia
text: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

name: Moneylender
text: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

name: Remodel
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Spy
text: Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

name: Thief
text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

name: Throne Room
text: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

name: Council Room
text: Each other player draws a card.

name: Library
text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

name: Mine
text: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

name: Witch
text: Each other player gains a Curse card.

name: Adventurer
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

name: Courtyard
text: Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Pawn
text: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +1 Coin.

name: Secret Chamber
text: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.
When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Masquerade
text: Each player passes a card from his hand to the left at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Shanty Town
text: Reveal your hand.  If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

name: Steward
text: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

name: Swindler
text: Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

name: Wishing Well
text: Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

name: Baron
text: You may discard an [[Estate]] card. If you do, +4 Coins.  Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

name: Bridge
text: All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Conspirator
text: If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

name: Coppersmith
text: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

name: Ironworks
text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Mining Village
text: You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

name: Scout
text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Duke
text: Worth 1 VP per Duchy you have.

name: Minion
text: Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

name: Saboteur
text: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

name: Torturer
text: Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

name: Trading Post
text: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a Silver card; put it into your hand.

name: Tribute
text: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an...

name: Upgrade
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Embargo
text: Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile.
When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

name: Haven
text: Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Lighthouse
text: Now and at the start of your next turn:
While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

name: Native Village
text: Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.
You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

name: Pearl Diver
text: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

name: Ambassador
text: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Fishing Village
text: At the start of your next turn:

name: Lookout
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

name: Smugglers
text: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

name: Caravan
text: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

name: Cutpurse
text: Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

name: Island
text: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.

name: Navigator
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Pirate Ship
text: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

name: Salvager
text: Trash a card from your hand. + Coins equal to its cost.

name: Sea Hag
text: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

name: Treasure Map
text: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Explorer
text: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

name: Ghost Ship
text: Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

name: Merchant Ship
text: Now and at the start of your next turn:

name: Outpost
text: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

name: Tactician
text: If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

name: Treasury
text: When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Wharf
text: Now and at the start of your next turn:

name: Herbalist
text: When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

name: Apprentice
text: Trash a card from your hand.
+2 Cards if it has Pot in its cost.

name: Transmute
text: Trash a card from your hand.

name: Vineyard
text: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Apothecary
text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.

name: Scrying Pool
text: Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one that is not an Action.  Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

name: University
text: You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Alchemist
text: When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

name: Familiar
text: Each other player gains a Curse.

name: Philosopher's Stone
text: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.  Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

name: Golem
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

name: Possession
text: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

name: Loan
text: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

name: Trade Route
text: +1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat.
Trash a card from your hand.
Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

name: Watchtower
text: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.
When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

name: Bishop
text: +1 Coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

name: Quarry
text: While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Talisman
text: While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

name: City
text: If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

name: Contraband
text: When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

name: Counting House
text: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

name: Mint
text: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.
When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

name: Mountebank
text: Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

name: Rabble
text: Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

name: Royal Seal
text: While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

name: Vault
text: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.  Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

name: Venture
text: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

name: Goons
text: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1VP.

name: Grand Market
text: You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

name: Hoard
text: While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

name: Bank
text: When you play this, it's worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

name: Expand
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Forge
text: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

name: King's Court
text: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

name: Peddler
text: During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Hamlet
text: You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Action.
You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Buy.

name: Fortune Teller
text: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

name: Menagerie
text: Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

name: Farming Village
text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

name: Horse Traders
text: When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

name: Remake
text: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

name: Tournament
text: Each player may reveal a [[Province]] from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card, +1 Coin.

name: Young Witch
text: Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse.
Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 Coins or 3 Coins to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

name: Harvest
text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

name: Horn of Plenty
text: When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it's a Victory card, trash this.

name: Hunting Party
text: Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn't a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Jester
text: Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it's a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise either he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

name: Fairgrounds
text: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (round down).

name: Crossroads
text: Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

name: Duchess
text: Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.
In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

name: Fool's Gold
text: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 Coin, otherwise it's worth 4 Coins.
When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

name: Develop
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 Coin less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Oracle
text: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.

name: Scheme
text: At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

name: Tunnel
text: When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Jack of all Trades
text: Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.
Draw until you have 5 cards in your hand.
You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

name: Noble Brigand
text: When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

name: Nomad Camp
text: When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

name: Silk Road
text: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

name: Spice Merchant
text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one: +2 Cards and +1 Action; or +2 Coins and +1 Buy.

name: Trader
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins.
When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a Silver.

name: Cache
text: When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

name: Cartographer
text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

name: Embassy
text: When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

name: Haggler
text: While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

name: Highway
text: While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Ill-Gotten Gains
text: When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand.
When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

name: Inn
text: When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Mandarin
text: Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

name: Margrave
text: Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

name: Stables
text: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

name: Border Village
text: When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

name: Farmland
text: 22 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Poor House
text: Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

name: Beggar
text: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.
When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

name: Squire
text: Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.
When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

name: Vagrant
text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

name: Forager
text: Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

name: Hermit
text: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure.
Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.
When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

name: Market Square
text: When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Sage
text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Storeroom
text: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.
Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

name: Urchin
text: Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.
When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

name: Armory
text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Death Cart
text: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.
When you gain this, gain two Ruins.

name: Feodum
text: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck.
When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

name: Fortress
text: When you trash this, put it into your hand.

name: Ironmonger
text: Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it.
Either way, if it is an...

name: Marauder
text: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.
Each other player gains a Ruins.

name: Procession
text: You may play an action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Rats
text: Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).

name: Scavenger
text: You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

name: Wandering Minstrel
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

name: Band of Misfits
text: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.
This is that card until it leaves play.

name: Bandit Camp
text: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Catacombs
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.
When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

name: Count
text: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; or put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.
Choose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

name: Counterfeit
text: When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.

name: Cultist
text: Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.

name: Graverobber
text: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

name: Junk Dealer
text: Trash a card from your hand.

name: Knights
text: Shuffle the Knights pile before each game with it. Keep it face down except for the top card, which is the only one that can be bought or gained.

name: Mystic
text: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

name: Pillage
text: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose.
Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Rebuild
text: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

name: Rogue
text: If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

name: Altar
text: Trash a card from your hand.
Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Hunting Grounds
text: When you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

name: Stonemason
text: Trash a card from your hand.  Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it.  If you do, gain 2 Actions each costing the amount you overpaid.

name: Doctor
text: Name a card.  Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck.  Trash the matches.  Put the rest back on top in any order.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it.  For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

name: Masterpiece
text: When you buy this, you may overpay for it.  If you do, gain a Silver per 1 Coin you overpaid.

name: Advisor
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck.  The player to your left chooses one of them.  Discard that card.  Put the other cards into your hand.

name: Plaza
text: You may discard a Treasure card.  If you do, take a Coin token.

name: Taxman
text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand.  Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it).  Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Herald
text: Reveal the top card of your deck.  If it is an Action, play it.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it.  For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

name: Baker
text: Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

name: Butcher
text: Take 2 Coin tokens.  You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens.  If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

name: Journeyman
text: Name a card.  Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card.  Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Merchant Guild
text: While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

name: Soothsayer
text: Gain a Gold.  Each other player gains a Curse.  Each player who did draws a card.
